

缺失数据操作


```{r}
data("airquality")
head(airquality)
```

对缺失值的处理默认是 `na.action = na.omit`

```{r}
# Ozone 最高的那天
aggregate(data = airquality, Ozone ~ Month, max)

aggregate(data = airquality, Ozone ~ Month, mean)

aggregate(data = airquality, cbind(Ozone, Solar.R, Wind, Temp) ~ Month, mean)
```

缺失值处理

```{r}
library(DataExplorer)
```


```{r}
plot_missing(airquality)
```

时间序列图


```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
ggplot(data = airquality, aes(x = 1:dim(airquality)[1], y = Ozone, color = as.factor(Month))) +
  geom_line()
```
